name: data-bi
description: 11 expert skills for data & business intelligence covering decision/reporting/governance, data engineering & pipelines, data literacy & storytelling, advanced analytics & machine learning, data quality & observability, streaming & real-time analytics, customer analytics, A/B testing & experimentation, time series forecasting, data visualization tools (Power BI/Tableau/Looker), and geospatial analytics (PostGIS/GeoPandas/H3).
